title: How to Become an Assassin on Roblox

steps.headline: Find someone who will hire you.
Agree on a way of payment.
steps.description: Settle a price that both of you agree on. For example, if 5 Robux, he or she can visit your game, if more, and you are BC, you can make a T-Shirt that he or she has to buy.

steps.headline: Be an elite assassin.
steps.description: Go to More>People then search "Assassin's Creed: Elite Assassins" and click Search Groups. Click the group that's called it and then hit join. Wait 1-2 hours. In the group description, read the links, also the "Novizio Test" to rank up. Start going to Masyaf and be active in the group. Someone will soon then be holding a training, and you'll be trained as an elite assassin.

steps.headline: Locate the target.
steps.description: Go to a war game that the target is at, or get him or her to come to you. Note: A good way to assassinate is to befriend the target.

steps.headline: Don't get killed by your target.
steps.description: If you kill him or her, and he or she kills you before you leave, the assassination doesn't count.

steps.headline: Say "consider yourself assassinated" after you killed the target one time.
steps.description: Ask the man or woman who hired you if he or she wants the target to know they sent you. If so, say "NameHere says hello."

steps.headline: Never say "I am here to kill you" if you fail to kill them.
steps.description: They will be wary of the price on their head.

text: Getting a job Find someone who will hire you.  Agree on a way of payment. Settle a price that both of you agree on. For example, if 5 Robux, he or she can visit your game, if more, and you are BC, you can make a T-Shirt that he or she has to buy. Be an elite assassin. Go to More>People then search "Assassin's Creed: Elite Assassins" and click Search Groups. Click the group that's called it and then hit join. Wait 1-2 hours. In the group description, read the links, also the "Novizio Test" to rank up. Start going to Masyaf and be active in the group. Someone will soon then be holding a training, and you'll be trained as an elite assassin. Finding the target Locate the target. Go to a war game that the target is at, or get him or her to come to you. Note: A good way to assassinate is to befriend the target. Don't get killed by your target. If you kill him or her, and he or she kills you before you leave, the assassination doesn't count. Say "consider yourself assassinated" after you killed the target one time. Ask the man or woman who hired you if he or she wants the target to know they sent you. If so, say "NameHere says hello." Never say "I am here to kill you" if you fail to kill them. They will be wary of the price on their head.
